title: Hollyoaks star Nadine Mulkerrin reveals post-baby body after giving birth
text:
(Picture: Nadine Mulkerrin/Instagram)

Hollyoaks star Nadine Mulkerrin has shared pictures of her post-baby body after giving birth to son Reggie last week.

The actress — who’s best known for playing Cleo McQueen in the Channel 4 soap — took to Instagram to share the trio of snaps on her account as she opened up about her and co-star Rory Douglas Speed — who portrays vicar Joel Dexter — welcoming their baby boy.

Nadine has documented her experience of motherhood thus far on her Instagram account, and in a new post, she revealed her post-baby body ‘1 Week Postpartum’, and described her experience as ‘the best rollercoaster’.

She said in the caption: ‘Between getting your partner to inject you and put suppositories in mysterious places it’s been a barrel of laughs!’

Fans were quick to share their support in the comment section below, with one saying: ‘Relate to this so much, I’m so glad you can be so real about postpartum!’ while another added: ‘Love this!! You look amazing! Congratulations again’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In addition to fans, Nadine’s Hollyoaks co-stars also heaped praise upon her, with Rachel Adedeji adding: ‘PERFECTION’, while Jessamy Stoddart commented: ‘You’re so beautiful xxx’

Rory also commented, saying: ‘You look amazing and all that but I mean… look at his toes’.

Nadine and Rory welcomed their baby boy Reggie last week, with Rory taking to instagram to heap praise on his fiancé after giving birth:

‘Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19. We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn’t think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour.’

With Nadine having already filmed final scenes, Cleo will depart from Hollyoaks rather soon — although it’s unknown what will cause the character to leave Chester just yet. However — unbeknown to Cleo — her boyfriend Mitchell (Imran Adams) has been developing feelings for Scott (Ross Adams), so it’s possible that this could tie-in to the character’s impending exit.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Nadine took to Instagram to share the snaps.
